metadata.description: Professional-grade Claude Code plugins for legal, document, and office automation

plugins.name: law-tools
plugins.description: Legal research toolkit with USPTO, court, SEC, and regulatory data connectors plus document drafting capabilities.

plugins.name: writing
plugins.description: Comprehensive writing guidance for professional documents with style guides and cognitive fluency techniques.

plugins.name: office-bridge
plugins.description: Microsoft Office automation via Office.js add-ins for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.

plugins.name: python-docx-redline
plugins.description: Document creation, editing, and analysis with tracked changes support for .docx files.

plugins.name: best-practices
plugins.description: Claude Code development best practices including the skill-creator skill.

plugins.name: dev-browser
plugins.description: Browser automation with persistent page state and LLM-optimized DOM snapshots.
